RelatedSentence: SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - Officials in North Korea are offering a rare public apology after the collapse of an apartment building that was under construction in the country 's capital .
The country 's official news agency did n't give a death toll -- but a South Korean official says hundreds may have died .
